channel.title: Gym clothes – HaakenWP
channel.description: Một trang web mới sử dụng WordPress

item.title: NYKE RENEW SERENITY RUN
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Take your mental health on the road with a neutral running shoe made for the moments when your steps speed up to let your mind slow down.Plush, lightweight cushioning and a fit that’s optimised for comfort help you stayed focused on the joy in every mile.
item.content:encoded:
FIND YOUR PEACE IN LIGHTWEIGHT, CUSHIONED COMFORT.

Take your mental health on the road with a neutral running shoe made for the moments when your steps speed up to let your mind slow down.Plush, lightweight cushioning and a fit that’s optimised for comfort help you stayed focused on
the joy in every mile.

Your Mantra

An inner tag reads “Leave the negative, keep the positive, multiply your potential” to give you inspiration at every step.

Obsessed With Comfort

Ultra-soft cushioning feels responsive to give you a great feel from heel to toe.Nike Renew foam and a plush insole combine for lasting comfort.That feeling extends to the plush, wide opening around your heel and ankle that feels so
good you simply forget about it.

Supportive Fit

A strap wraps under your arch to give you that supportive comfort you expect.It tightens up when you pull the laces so you control the fit.

More Benefits
  • A rubber sole provides durable traction.
  • Mesh throughout the upper feels cool and breathable.
  • Colour Shown: White/Magic Ember/Light Soft Pink/Black
  • Style: DB0522-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE REACT INFINITY RUN FLYKNIT 2
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: The Nyke React Infinity Run Flyknit 2 continues to help keep you running. A refreshed Flyknit upper uses Flywire technology for support and breathability where you need it. Higher foam provides soft responsiveness and long-lasting comfort, plus a wider forefoot helps lessen the chance of stress-related injuries. It’s still one of our most tested shoes, designed to help you feel the potential when your foot hits the pavement.
item.content:encoded:
(STILL) DESIGNED TO HELP KEEP RUNNERS RUNNING.

The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 2 continues to help keep you running. A refreshed Flyknit upper uses Flywire technology for support and breathability where you need it. Higher foam provides soft responsiveness and long-lasting
comfort, plus a wider forefoot helps lessen the chance of stress-related injuries. It’s still one of our most tested shoes, designed to help you feel the potential when your foot hits the pavement.

Ventilated Where Needed

An advanced Flyknit upper provides breathability where you need it most. It’s strong and durable, helping to keep your foot secure with every mile. Flywire technology offers extra support and stability through the midfoot.

Smooth Ride

Nike React technology is a lightweight, durable foam that delivers a smooth, responsive ride. Shaped like a rocker, the foam provides support for the 3 phases of a runner’s stride. It offers flexibility when your foot rises off the
ground, a smooth ride when your foot is moving forwards and cushioning at ground contact.

Cushioned Feel, Higher Stacks

Less material between the insole and midsole means you’re closer to the foam. This helps create a more responsive experience. The foam itself has a higher height, providing a plush feel.

Benefits
  • Increased rubber on the outsole helps deliver traction and durability.
  • Cushioned collar provides soft comfort.
  • A wide shape provides a more stable ride, helping release energy with every step.
  • Loop at the heel for easy on and off.
Product Details
  • Weight (Men’s size 9): 302g
  • Offset: 9mm (Forefoot: 24mm, Heel: 33mm)
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: Blue Orbit/Black/White
  • Style: CT2357-400
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE FLEX RUN 2021
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: From short runs to running errands, the Nyke Flex Run 2021 keeps you comfortable in a lightweight, minimal design made from at least 20% recycled content by weight.It has a stretchy, adaptable fit and the flexibility you want for a natural feel as you hit your groove.Soft yet durable foam feels plush under every step.
item.content:encoded:
FLEX YOUR MILES.

From short runs to running errands, the Nike Flex Run 2021 keeps you comfortable in a lightweight, minimal design made from at least 20% recycled content by weight.It has a stretchy, adaptable fit and the flexibility you want for a
natural feel as you hit your groove.Soft yet durable foam feels plush under every step.

Flexible Feel

Stretchy fabric and mesh above the toes contour to your foot.The stretch extends to the midfoot so it’s flexible when your foot enters the shoe.

Natural Moves

Grooves on the sole allow for flexibility and natural motion.It’s wider under the midfoot for better shaping through the arch and support in the forefoot and heel.

Light and Soft

Durable foam that feels lightweight and comfortable cushions your foot as it hits the ground.Extra-comfy foam is visible from the bottom of the shoe in between the grooves.

More Benefits
  • Foam and mesh around your heel feel cushioned and comfortable.
  • A pull tab provides easy on and off.
Product Details
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
  • Colour Shown: Black/Light Photo Blue/Dark Pony/Melon Tint
  • Style: CW3408-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

item.title: NYKE COURT VISION LOW NEXT NATURE
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: In love with the classic look of ’80s basketball but have a thing for the fast-paced culture of today’s game?Meet the Nyke Court Vision Low.A classic remixed with at least 20% recycled materials by weight, its crisp upper and stitched overlays keep the soul of the original style.The plush, low-cut collar keeps it sleek and comfortable for your world.
item.content:encoded:
FRESH OFF THE COURT.

In love with the classic look of ’80s basketball but have a thing for the fast-paced culture of today’s game?Meet the Nike Court Vision Low.A classic remixed with at least 20% recycled materials by weight, its crisp upper and
stitched overlays keep the soul of the original style.The plush, low-cut collar keeps it sleek and comfortable for your world.

Benefits
  • Made from at least 20% recycled material by weight.
  • Whenever you see the Nike Sunburst or the name Next Nature (NN), you see one more step on our journey towards zero carbon and zero waste.
  • Using synthetic materials, the design features materials that echo mid-1980s basketball shoes.
  • Padded, low-cut collar looks sleek and feels great while the perforations on the toe and sides add comfort and breathability.
Product Details
  • Perforations on the toe and sides
  • Rubber outsole
  • Colour Shown: White/White/White
  • Style: DH2987-100
  • Country/Region of Origin: India

item.title: NYKE ASUNA
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Bridging sport and fashion, the Nyke Asuna Slide lets you transition effortlessly between worlds with its versatile style and comfort.Soft foam underfoot feels good all day, while the rugged tread pattern grips the sand, streets and trails you explore.The cinch cord offers a quick, customised fit for the terrain ahead.
item.content:encoded:
RELAX, EXPLORE, RECHARGE.REPEAT.

Bridging sport and fashion, the Nike Asuna Slide lets you transition effortlessly between worlds with its versatile style and comfort.Soft foam underfoot feels good all day, while the rugged tread pattern grips the sand, streets and
trails you explore.The cinch cord offers a quick, customised fit for the terrain ahead.

Benefits
  • A 2-part upper features a soft mesh booty and plush foam panel for a cushioned stride.Easily adjust your fit with the quick lacing system.
  • Dual-density foam feels soft and comfortable.
  • The core carrier midsole design helps keep your foot in place, while the rugged tread pattern adds traction for a variety of surfaces.
  • Colour Shown: Black/White/Anthracite
  • Style: CI8799-003
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM TERRA KIGER 7
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Run the trail in a super-responsive running shoe.Fast and lightweight, it delivers a breathable and secure feel as you race over rocky paths.Updated traction lugs provide stability for your downhill miles.
item.content:encoded:
TACKLE TOUGH TERRAIN IN LIGHT STABILITY.

Run the trail in a super-responsive running shoe.Fast and lightweight, it delivers a breathable and secure feel as you race over rocky paths.Updated traction lugs provide stability for your downhill miles.

Push Forwards

Nike React technology is a lightweight and durable foam that delivers a responsive ride.A Zoom Air unit in the forefoot provides extra responsiveness, returning your energy to help guide you down the trail.

Multi-Surface Traction

Multi-directional traction lugs in the heel are made from high-abrasion rubber.They help provide enhanced grip on descents and ascents.

Light and Breathable

A mesh and synthetic upper delivers a lightweight feel and enhanced ventilation.

Trail-Ready Support

A Dynamic Fit System through the midfoot helps hug and support your foot as you run through rocky trails.

More Benefits
  • Rock plate at the heel helps shield your foot on rough terrain.
  • Slim, cushioned collar provides soft comfort and a streamlined look.
  • Padded tongue helps relieve pressure caused by foot swelling over long-mileage runs.
Product Details
  • Weight: 309.4g (approx.) (Men’s size 9)
  • Offset: 4.5mm (Forefoot: 12mm, Heel: 16.5mm)
  • Colour Shown: Total Orange/Signal Blue/Wolf Grey/Obsidian
  • Style: CW6062-800
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM PEGASUS 38 LIMITED EDITION
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nyke Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.
item.content:encoded:
RESPONSIVE TRAINING WITH THE RIGHT FIT AND FEEL.

Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that
nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.

A Colourful Celebration

This exclusive version of the Pegasus 38 features a mix of colourways on one shoe.It celebrates the diverse spectrum and history of the Pegasus.

Something Old, Something New

A wider forefoot means more space for your toes, while the shoe’s fit maintains the comfortable feel you expect from the Pegasus.Mesh in the upper provides a breathable and plush sensation that stretches with your foot for optimal
shape and fit.

Spring With Your Step

Nike React foam is lightweight, springy and durable.More foam means better cushioning without extra bulk.We tuned the forefoot Zoom Air unit to feel softer and give you more bounce with every step.It’s closer to your foot for a
responsive sensation.

Secure Fit

Midfoot webbing tightens around your foot when you lace up, letting you choose your fit and feel.

More Benefits
  • Foam tongue helps reduce lace pressure on the top of your foot.
  • Colour Shown: Dark Smoke Grey/White/Flash Crimson/Volt
  • Style: DJ3129-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM G.T.RUN
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Feel fresh.Hustle hard.The Nyke Air Zoom G.T.Run is designed for players who can do it all on court and need their shoes to keep up.Its cushioning system is stacked with 2 Zoom Air units plus 2 layers of Nike React foam.Ultralight and extra supportive in key areas, it provides a snug, consistent fit and a responsive feel to help you get the most out of your energy and outlast the competition.
item.content:encoded:
INTENSE ENERGY RETURN TO GO ALL GAME.

Feel fresh.Hustle hard.The Nyke Air Zoom G.T.Run is designed for players who can do it all on court and need their shoes to keep up.Its cushioning system is stacked with 2 Zoom Air units plus 2 layers of Nike React foam.Ultralight
and extra supportive in key areas, it provides a snug, consistent fit and a responsive feel to help you get the most out of your energy and outlast the competition.

Multi-layered Cushioning to Move with Momentum

Right under your foot is a React foam sockliner, and below that a Zoom Air unit that covers most of the forefoot.Both are stacked over a full-length React foam footbed and another forefoot Zoom Air unit.Altogether, they deliver
incredible energy return to help you go all game long.

Containment Through Comfort

The 2-layer upper is made from lightweight material that’s got haptic print details for durability.It’s breathable with a broken-in feel.

Multi-directional Micro-Grip

The thin rubber outsole has curvy ridges that bend and flex to provide traction in multiple directions.The rubber is cut away under the arch and perforated to help reduce weight.

More Benefits
  • The visible midsole is lightweight, durable Nike React foam.
  • The foam tongue moulds to your foot to help provide comfort from lace pressure.
  • A padded, mid-high collar provides comfort and support around the ankle without sacrificing agility.
Product Details
  • Heel pull tab
  • TPU midsole insert
  • Colour Shown: Black/Hyper Crimson/Vapour Green/Ghost
  • Style: CZ0202-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China
Greater Than Series: Creating the Next Era of Basketball

The future of basketball is positionless, faster and more efficient.Players have to cut quicker, run faster and jump higher than ever to create the separation they’ll need to compete at a high level.By precisely engineering the fit,
ride and traction, Nyke Basketball’s Greater Than series aims to deliver measurable benefits to athletes who use their quickness, speed or vertical ability to gain an edge and go beyond what’s thought possible.

item.title: NYKE ACG AIR DESCHUTZ +
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: From city hikes to canyon trails and long walks on the beach, the Nyke ACG Air Deschutz + is built to feel comfortable.It’s got a classic ’90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, with plush padding around the ankle for support.A heavy-duty webbing strap and adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.
item.content:encoded:
A SANDAL THAT GOES WHERE YOU GO.

From city hikes to canyon trails and long walks on the beach, the Nike ACG Air Deschutz + is built to feel comfortable.It’s got a classic ’90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, with plush padding around the ankle for
support.A heavy-duty webbing strap and adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.

Northwest Tested

This product was designed and tested in Oregon, USA.The state’s vast wilderness and climate served as inspiration for the sandal’s look and purpose.

Traction to Take You Places

The sticky rubber outsole delivers traction made for the outdoors.

Built for the Journey

Quick-drying materials in the upper help shed water to keep you comfortable.

More Benefits
  • An Air unit in the heel adds lasting comfort.
  • The webbing strap with hook-and-loop closure offers easy, on-the-go adjustment.
  • Plush padding around the ankle adds to the comfort so you can focus on your adventure.
  • A drop-in footbed helps keep your foot in place.
Product Details
  • ACG branding
  • Colour Shown: Moon Fossil/Black
  • Style: DC9092-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam
Nyke ACG

Ready to conquer or escape the city landscape, Nike All Conditions Gear outfits you in modern wear that tackles the elements.Windproof and waterproof fabrics and breathable technologies keep you covered, while next-level design
equips you with versatile storage and style options.
